Service name: Register a change of land or property ownership
User needs: As someone who has bought or inherited land or property I need to make sure that I am its registered owner
Existing services: Transfer of whole (transfer; assent); Severance of joint tenancy; Death of a proprietor

Service name: Register a mortgage on land or property
User needs: As a lender I need to make sure my financial interest in the property is registered so it can be protected

Service name: Register a property for the first time
User needs: As someone who owns unregistered land or property I need to make sure it is registered in my name so I can sell it if I need to
Practice guides: PG1, PG2, PG3, Submit deeds: PG8

User needs: As the owner of land or property I need to register that I have sold off part of the title so that its boundaries are shown correctly

Service name: Register an interest in or right to use land or property
Register a right of way over land or property
Register a restriction or notice on land or property
Register or cancel a lease on land or property
Update land or property owner's details
Existing services: Change of name; Change of address for service

Service name: Register as a land or property owner's attorney
User needs: As the attorney for the owner I need to prove I am authorised so I can deal with or sell the property on their behalf

Service name: Contact the owner of land or property
Protect your right to stay in your marital home during a divorce or separation
Report a land or property registration error
Use farming stock or equipment as security for a loan
Claim ownership of land or property
